Uses of Interface
javax.constraints.VarSet

Uses of VarSet in javax.constraints
 

Methods in javax.constraints that return VarSet
 VarSet Solution.getVarSet(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the solution variable with the given name.
 VarSet[] Solution.getVarSets()
          Returns an array of the integer variables included in the solution.
 VarSet[] SearchStrategy.getVarSets()
          Returns a an array of set variables that is in use by this strategy
 VarSet VarSet.intersection(VarSet varSet)
          Creates a new set variable that is an intersection of this set variable with the "varSet" passed as a parameter.
 VarSet VarSet.union(VarSet varSet)
          Creates a new set variable that is an union of this set variable with the "varSet" passed as a parameter.
 VarSet Problem.varSet(java.lang.String name, int[] values)
          Creates a constrained set variable VarSet with the name "name" and which domain consists of integer values from the array "value".
 VarSet Problem.varSet(java.lang.String name, int min, int max)
          Creates a constrained set variable VarSet with the name "name" and domain of integer values from "min" to "max" inclusive.
 

Methods in javax.constraints with parameters of type VarSet
 VarSet VarSet.intersection(VarSet varSet)
          Creates a new set variable that is an intersection of this set variable with the "varSet" passed as a parameter.
 void SearchStrategy.setVarSets(VarSet[] varSets)
          Defines an array of set variables that may be used (or not) by this strategy
 void Solver.trace(VarSet setVar)
          This method forces to trace (to log) all modification events for the variable "setVar".
 VarSet VarSet.union(VarSet varSet)
          Creates a new set variable that is an union of this set variable with the "varSet" passed as a parameter.
